channel.title: Guy Lauzon
channel.description: Recent news about Guy Lauzon, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Seaway News
item.description:
Cornwall woman feted with volunteer award
From left are Ray O'Collin (Cornwall Canada Day Committee Member and Senior Volunteer of the Year Co-Ordinator) Edith Sturgeon and MP Guy Lauzon. Published on August 14, 2013. Published on August 14, 2013. Tweet. Topics : Big Brothers Big Sisters ...

item.title: Mentioned by Seaway News
item.description:
Lauzon takes a swipe at Trudeau over marijuana position
CORNWALL, Ontario - Local MP Guy Lauzon is fuming over comments made by Justin Trudeau where the federal Liberal leader suggested he wanted to legalize marijuana. Lauzon said Tuesday Trudeau's comments are short-sighted on a number of fronts.

item.title: Mentioned by The Morrisburg Leader
item.description:
South Dundas Soccer Association holds World Cup
As he has every year since 2004, MP Guy Lauzon, holding the torch, declared “the 2013 World Cup Soccer in South Dundas open.” Before nearly 500 players and their families, the Torch was carried around the track by representatives from each of the soccer ...

item.title: Mentioned by Seaway News
item.description:
MAC'S MUSINGS: Surprise, surprise - Super Guy lines up with the PM
This is pretty big stuff: Guy Lauzon, Conservative MP for Stormont-Dundas-South Glengarry, president of the Steve Harper Fan Club, made front-page news for praising the PM's picks in the recent cabinet shuffle. Wow. Imagine that jaw-dropper. A member of ...

item.title: Mentioned by OurHometown.ca
item.description:
Lauzon Announces EODP Funding for Winchelsea Events
Winchester - July 24, 2013 - Local Member of Parliament Guy Lauzon announced today that Winchelsea Events in North Dundas will receive funding through the Eastern Ontario Development Program. Winchelsea Events will receive $50,000 to expand their ...
